topic.name: The General (Catholic) Epistles
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for The General (Catholic) Epistles in Bible & Theology

objectives.sub_subject_name: New Testament Studies: Life and Doctrine in Christ

objectives.sub_topic_name: Jude: Contending for the Faith

objectives.objective_text: Observe that we should be quick to listen and slow to speak.
